song.englishname: Just a Little Talk With Jesus

english.segment1: I once was lost in sin, Jesus took me in. And then a light from heaven filled my soul. He filled my heart with love, wrote my name above. Just a talk with Jesus makes it all right. (repeat)
english.segment2: Chorus. Have a little talk with Jesus. Tell God about your troubles. He'll hear the faintest cry. And answer bye and bye. Feel the prayer wheel turning. Know that the fire's burning. Just a talk with Jesus makes it all right
